\documentclass[tikz]{standalone}


\usepackage{tikz}

\begin{document}

\begin{tikzpicture}

% curve
\fill (0,1) -- (1,1) -- (1,0) -- (0,0);
\fill (0.95,0) -- (0.95,2) -- (1.2,2) -- (1.2, 0);

% axes
\draw[thick] (0,-0.5) -- (0,3);
\draw[thick] (-0.5,0) -- (2,0);

% axes ticks
\path (-0.2, 1) node {1};
\path (-0.2, 2) node {2};
\path (1, -0.2) node {1};

% axes labels
\path (1.7, -0.4) node {time};
\path (-0.7, 1.7) node[rotate=90] {amount of goo};

% 100%
\path (0.75, 1.5) node {\Huge \{};
\path[align=center, text width=20pt] (0.3, 1.5) node {\tiny \baselineskip=1pt 100\% inc. \par};

\end{tikzpicture}

\end{document}
